last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 9
last_episode_to_air.overview: Three years later, life has moved on for everyone. With the next general election looming, a scandal breaks, changing the political winds for Taishi.

name: Let's Get Divorced
overview: A mediatised married couple who no longer love each other is highly optimistic about getting a divorce. However, external circumstances will get in their way and they will have no other choice but to work hand in hand to reach their ultimate goal: getting a divorce.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While Yui's acting career soars, her politician husband's popularity is in the dumps, and their marriage has become a minefield of resentments.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: While meeting with their respective lawyers, Yui and Taishi remember the early days when everything felt perfect; but trouble was just around the corner.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Yui's boss begs her to put off the divorce, and he's not the only one. It turns out that Yui's lawyer and Taishi's lawyer share a past.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The sharp and ambitious Go Soda announces he'll be running to represent Ehime's fifth district — Taishi's seat. Will Yui help her husband win reelection?

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: While in Ehime filming her "Mikochan Special" and helping Taishi, Yui gets a text from Kyoji. Taishi resolves to build on his father's legacy.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: New revelations throw an already complicated situation into further chaos. Despite himself, Taishi is amazed by Kyoji's free spirit.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As the scandals and revelations pile up, Yui and Taishi decide to pull the trigger on their divorce. Later, their press conferences goes off the rails.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Two days to the election, the Ehime fifth district candidates hold their final debate — and this time, thanks to Yui's help, Taishi is prepared.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Three years later, life has moved on for everyone. With the next general election looming, a scandal breaks, changing the political winds for Taishi.
